sourcesContent: import React from "react" function TodoItem(props){ const completedStyle = { fontStyle:"italics", color:"#8893B8", textDecoration:"line-through", textStyle:"italics" } return( {props.handleCheckChange(props.todo.id)}} checked={props.todo.complete}/> {props.todo.text} {props.onDelete(props.todo.id)}}>Delete ) } export default TodoItem
